name: Heroku: scoutx
description: A Flask App that send sms alerts about glucose level to your family or friends.

FIREBASE_PRIVATE_KEY.description: A json file with the firebase credentials.

NEXMO_APPLICATION_ID.description: The application id, get this in the vonage dashboard > in the application settings.

NEXMO_PRIVATE_KEY.description: The private key path, you can download this in the vonage dashboard > in the application settings

NEXMO_API_KEY.description: The nexmo api key. Available in the user settings section on the vonage dashboard

NEXMO_API_SECRET.description: The api secret, also available in the user settings section on the vonage dashboard

WAIT_AFTER_CALL.description: If a call is done then wait a time after call the same number again

NEXMO_FAILED_PING_SMS.description: When the number of failed pings is 60 send a sms to customer
